entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 p.m. PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 11.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 11:00 PM PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 8.0°C
Wind: W 8 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
